price: 18 Si vous criez au mensonge, d’autres nations l’ont fait avant vous. La mission du Messager consiste uniquement à transmettre le message en toute clarté.
arabic: وَإِن تُكَذِّبُواْ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ أُمَمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡۖ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-in tukadhibū faqad kadhaba umamun min qablikum wamā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
